thread.title: Iryna Piwowar

author: Iryna Piwowar
title: Iryna Piwowar
text:
The idea itself to provide any kind of popular and desired courses for people is amazing! Lots of possibilites to be qualified for and later to enjoy you choice of courses. I got 5 courses ( 1 was for free), still learning and as no dead line for completion, so no hurry :) Moreover, I plan to use all the courses I've chosen for my career plans. Great! thanks for opportunity!!
Regards,
Iryna
